author: eth2_bridge_bot
content:
**protolambda**
Can confirm that reading the first offset is the way of determining the end of the fixed part. And then divide that by the length of an individual offset, and you get the count. Good question, but I am still hesitant in including a full blown deserialization spec, when it "should" (doubt) be clear from the serialization. Maybe a note on offsets could help.
